Thats all ;) and question away

item.title: Zammyking111's Help Thread [All Questions Get Answerd]
item.dc:creator: @warmwaddle warmwaddle
item.description:
@warmwaddle wrote:

Ok still need help got a hundred errors, starting with this

client.java:16620: <identifier> expected else if (NPCID == 37) { // tele to tzhaar ^ client.java:16625: illegal start of type else if (NPCID == 2301) { // tele to monkey area guy ^ client.java:16625: <identifier> expected else if (NPCID == 2301) { // tele to monkey area guy ^ client.java:16630: illegal start of type else if (NPCID == 2301) { // random event ^ client.java:16630: <identifier> expected else if (NPCID == 2301) { // random event ^ client.java:16639: illegal start of type else if (NPCID == 1835) { // Easterbunny pmgz!! ^ client.java:16639: <identifier> expected else if (NPCID == 1835) { // Easterbunny pmgz!! ^ client.java:16647: illegal start of type else if (NPCID == 1686) { /*Ghost in wild*/ ^ client.java:16647: <identifier> expected else if (NPCID == 1686) { /*Ghost in wild*/
What did I do wrong? I removed the other ones I added in the wrong spot, and added this:

} else if (NPCID == 1841) { // Admin zone thing PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 43; // Barrows shop } else if (NPCID == 200) { // Admin zone thing2 PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 44; // Other shop } else if (NPCID == 216) { // Admin zone thing3 PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 45; // othershop2 } else if (NPCID == 289) { // Admin zone thing4 PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 46; // other shop 3 } else if (NPCID == 806) { // Admin zone thing5
Right under the auborary mage shop thing.

Yes add after the //

hi can you help me with this question? i already downloaded and i cant get on to an account wat do i do??? if you can i would apprectiate it
Go here and read this it should answer all of your qestions :) and help you out alot
moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

[quote=“robbie willi, post:11, topic:102874”]i kno tht but where?

(kk im a noob i kno lol)[/quote]

Delete yours and add mine

public static void createSpell(int castId, int casterY, int casterX, int offsetY, int offsetX, int angle, int speed, int movegfxID,int startHeight, int endHeight, int finishID, int enemyY, int enemyX, int MageAttackIndex) { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { if(p != null) { client person = (client)p; if(person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null") //if(person.distanceToPoint(enemyY, enemyX) <= 60) person.firespell(castId, casterY, casterX, offsetY, offsetX, angle, speed, movegfxID, startHeight, endHeight, finishID, enemyY, enemyX, MageAttackIndex);} } }

item.title: Zammyking111's Help Thread [All Questions Get Answerd]
item.dc:creator: @zammyking111 zammyking111
item.description:
@zammyking111 wrote:

You need a }

[quote=“robbie willi, post:9, topic:102874”]ive got this now:

[code]public static void createSpell(int castId, int casterY, int casterX, int

offsetY, int offsetX, int angle, int speed, int movegfxID,int startHeight, int

endHeight, int finishID, int enemyY, int enemyX) {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {
if(p != null) {
client person = (client)p;
if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != “null”))
//if(person.distanceToPoint(enemyY, enemyX) <= 60)
person.firespell(castId, casterY, casterX,

offsetY, offsetX, angle, speed, movegfxID, startHeight, endHeight, finishID,

enemyY, enemyX);

}

break;
}
}[/code]

and it still says:

GraphicsHandler.java:78: '}' expected } ^ 1 error[/quote]

Or you can delete your and add mine

public static void createSpell(int castId, int casterY, int casterX, int offsetY, int offsetX, int angle, int speed, int movegfxID,int startHeight, int endHeight, int finishID, int enemyY, int enemyX, int MageAttackIndex) { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { if(p != null) { client person = (client)p; if(person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null") //if(person.distanceToPoint(enemyY, enemyX) <= 60) person.firespell(castId, casterY, casterX, offsetY, offsetX, angle, speed, movegfxID, startHeight, endHeight, finishID, enemyY, enemyX, MageAttackIndex);} } }

offsetY, int offsetX, int angle, int speed, int movegfxID,int startHeight, int

endHeight, int finishID, int enemyY, int enemyX) {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {
if(p != null) {
client person = (client)p;
if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != “null”))
//if(person.distanceToPoint(enemyY, enemyX) <= 60)
person.firespell(castId, casterY, casterX,

offsetY, offsetX, angle, speed, movegfxID, startHeight, endHeight, finishID,

enemyY, enemyX);

}

break;
}
}[/code]

and it still says:

GraphicsHandler.java:78: '}' expected } ^ 1 error

item.title: Zammyking111's Help Thread [All Questions Get Answerd]
item.dc:creator: @zammyking111 zammyking111
item.description:
@zammyking111 wrote:

Here follow this

  1. Search for
} else if (NPCID == 553) { //Aubury rune shop
  1. Under it add this

} else if (NPCID == Your Npc ID) { // Npc Name PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = Your Wanne SHop; // Your Stores Name

  1. Once youve done that open shops.cfg scroll down add your wanne shop info and stuff you want to be in the store.

  2. go back to client.java and change your monsters wanne shop id to what it is in the client.java

  3. Spawn it in the auto spawn where you want it to be at

And you got the Npc handler correct

Tico135:

We have a help thread. We do not need more than one. Sorry.

Are you kidding me lol

[quote=“Owned Irl, post:6, topic:102874”]robbi under the code he told you to do…

add another }

break;
}
}[/quote]
I was trying to get to that

Read full topic

item.title: Zammyking111's Help Thread [All Questions Get Answerd]
item.dc:creator: @warmwaddle warmwaddle
item.description:
@warmwaddle wrote:

I need help making brand new shops…
I added this in client.java

else if (NPCID == 1841) { // Admin zone guy1 PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 43; } else if (NPCID == 200) { // Admin zone guy2 PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 44; } else if (NPCID == 216) { // Admin zone guy3 PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 45; } else if (NPCID == 289) { // admin zone guy4 PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 46; } else if (NPCID == 806) { // admin zone guy5 PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 47;
This in autospawn.cfg

spawn = 1841	2205	3258	0	0	0	0	0	2	admin zone guylol
spawn = 200	2208	3258	0	0	0	0	0	1	admin zone guy
spawn = 216	2199	3256	0	0	0	0	0	1	admin zone guy
spawn = 289	2200	3249	0	0	0	0	0	1	Admin zone guy
spawn = 806	2192	3249	0	0	0	0	0	1	Admin zone guy

And this in npchandler.java…

[code]

				if (npcs[i].npcType == 533) { 
					if (misc.random2(15) == 1) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdate = "Get your barrows here!!!";
					}
				}
				if (npcs[i].npcType == 200) { 
					if (misc.random2(15) == 1) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdate = "Ranger stuff here!!";
					}
				}
				if (npcs[i].npcType == 216) { 
					if (misc.random2(15) == 1) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdate = "Dragon armor, whips, Furys, and other stuff here";
					}
				}
				if (npcs[i].npcType == 289) { 
					if (misc.random2(15) == 1) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdate = "Get your rare stuff here, my admin.";
					}
				}
				if (npcs[i].npcType == 806) { 
					if (misc.random2(15) == 1) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdate = "Crud here.";
					}
				}[/code]

They are all npc’s that dont have the trade option. But my other shops you can just talk to them to trade… Think i might have to have the trade-with kinda npc’s? Or could i keep the current npc’s but have to add something special for them to talk to to trade with them. Thanks!
EDIT


shop = 43	@red@Barrows_@blu@Shop!				2	2	4716	1000	4718	1000	4720	1000	4722	1000	4708	1000	4712	1000	4714	1000	4710	1000	4753	1000	4755	500	4757	500	4759	500	4732	500	4734	500	4736	500	4738	50	4745	50	4747	50	4749	50	4751	50	4724	50	4726	50	4728	50	4730	500
shop = 44	@red@Range_@blu@Shop!				2	2	1115	1000	1115	1000	1115	1000	1115	1000	1115	1000	6568	1000	1115	1000	1052	1000	1115	1000	6916	500	6918	500	6920	500	6922	500	6924	500	6889	500	7454	50	7455	50	7456	50	7457	50	7458	50	7459	50	7460	50	7461	50	5698	500	1305	500	4587	500	1377	500	3204	500	5730	500	5574	500	5575	500	5576	500		6733	1000	6735	1000	6737	1000	3105	100
shop = 45	@red@Other_@blu@Shop!				2	2	1115	1000	1115	1000	1115	1000	1115	1000	1115	1000	6568	1000	1115	1000	1052	1000	1115	1000	6916	500	6918	500	6920	500	6922	500	6924	500	6889	500	7454	50	7455	50	7456	50	7457	50	7458	50	7459	50	7460	50	7461	50	5698	500	1305	500	4587	500	1377	500	3204	500	5730	500	5574	500	5575	500	5576	500		6733	1000	6735	1000	6737	1000	3105	100
shop = 46	@red@Rare_@blu@Shop!				2	2	1115	1000	1115	1000	1115	1000	1115	1000	1115	1000	6568	1000	1115	1000	1052	1000	1115	1000	6916	500	6918	500	6920	500	6922	500	6924	500	6889	500	7454	50	7455	50	7456	50	7457	50	7458	50	7459	50	7460	50	7461	50	5698	500	1305	500	4587	500	1377	500	3204	500	5730	500	5574	500	5575	500	5576	500		6733	1000	6735	1000	6737	1000	3105	100
shop = 47	@red@Junk_@blu@Shop!				2	2	1115	1000	1115	1000	1115	1000	1115	1000	1115	1000	6568	1000	1115	1000	1052	1000	1115	1000	6916	500	6918	500	6920	500	6922	500	6924	500	6889	500	7454	50	7455	50	7456	50	7457	50	7458	50	7459	50	7460	50	7461	50	5698	500	1305	500	4587	500	1377	500	3204	500	5730	500	5574	500	5575	500	5576	500		6733	1000	6735	1000	6737	1000	3105	100

The barrows shop is the only one that I made the items for, but non of them will work. That was in shops.cfg ^^^^^^^^^^
